input_text:
Job Title: Chairperson, Department of Ob/Gyn, Overlook Medical Center

Location: Summit, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Job Description

Atlantic Health System is Seeking a Chairperson for the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology in Summit, New Jersey

Atlantic Health System, one of the largest non-profit healthcare networks in New Jersey, is seeking a physician to lead the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology at Overlook Medical Center. The Chairperson of Ob/Gyn will provide clinical and administrative leadership to attending physicians, as well as the Atlantic Health System Ob/Gyn residents. The Chairperson will collaborate with nursing staff to ensure an exceptional patient experience while driving innovation and excellence in women’s healthcare.

Overlook Medical Center in situated in Summit, New Jersey, just 22 miles west of NYC. Summit proudly boasts excellent schools, convenient mass transportation, and a charming downtown area filled with boutique shops and dining options.

Key Highlights of Overlook Medical Center’s Department of Ob/Gyn: 

 Over 2,200 deliveries each year  15-bed Level III Neonatal Intensive Care Unit  Recognized in 2024 by US News & World Report as High Performing in Maternity Care  Overlook Medical Center is a 513-bed community hospital and has several awards and designations including America’s 50 Best Hospitals in 2023 by Healthgrades and Patient Safety Excellence Award 2023 by Healthgrades. 


Responsibilities:

The Chairperson is responsible for all aspects of the Department which includes oversight of department growth, quality and safety, management of perioperative services, education, and research. To maintain clinical skillset and strong credibility within the Department, t he role includes an expectation to remain clinically active (50%).

 Qualifications 

Please apply to learn more about this opportunity. 

Qualifications 

 Ideally 7-10 years of experience  Strong clinical leader with experience driving improvements in quality and safety  Track record of progressive physician leadership roles  Comfort level managing a combination of employed and voluntary staff  Board-certification and eligible for licensure in the state of New Jersey 


ID: 18148

About Us

ABOUT US

At Atlantic Health System, Our Promise To Our Communities Is; Anyone Who Enters One Of Our Facilities, Will Receive The Highest Quality Care Delivered At The Right Time, At The Right Place, And At The Right Cost. This Commitment Is Also Echoed In The Respect, Development And Opportunities We Give To Our More Than 20,000 Team Members. Headquartered In Morristown, New Jersey, We Are One Of The Leading Non-profit Health Care Systems In The Nation. Our Facilities And Sites Of Care Include:

Morristown Medical Center, Morristown, NJOverlook Medical Center, Summit, NJNewton Medical Center, Newton, NJChilton Medical Center, Pompton Plains, NJHackettstown Medical Center, Hackettstown, NJGoryeb Children's Hospital, Morristown, NJCentraState Healthcare System, Freehold, NJAtlantic Home Care and HospiceAtlantic Mobile HealthAtlantic Rehabilitation


We also have more than 900 community-based healthcare providers affiliated through Atlantic Medical Group. Atlantic Accountable Care Organization is one of the largest ACOs in the nation, and we are a member of AllSpire Health Partners.

We Have Received Awards And Recognition For The Services We Have Provided To Our Patients, Team Members And Communities. Below Are Just a Few Of Our Accolades:

100 Best Companies to Work For ® and FORTUNE® magazine for 15 years Best Places to Work in Healthcare - Modern Healthcare150 Top Places to work in Healthcare - Becker's Healthcare100 Accountable Care Organizations to Know - Becker's Hospital ReviewBest Employers for Workers over 50 - AARPGold-Level "Well Workplace": Wellness Council of America (WELCOA)One of the 100 Best Workplaces for “Millennials” Great Place to Work® and FORTUNE® magazineOne of the 20 Best Workplaces in Health Care: Great Place to Work® and FORTUNE® magazineOfficial Health Care Partner of the New York JetsNJ Sustainable Business 


Named one of America's 50 Best Hospitals by Healthgrades, a World’s Best Hospital by Newsweek and recognized as a Best Regional Hospital in the NY Metro area by U.S. News & World Report.

Our Atlantic Neuroscience Institute is the region’s leader in neuroscience care. A hub for the New Jersey Stroke Network, we offer a broad range of advanced neurological, neurosurgical and neurodiagnostic services. We are also certified as a Level IV Epilepsy Center and home to the Gerald J. Glasser Brain Tumor Center, where more brain tumor surgeries are performed than anywhere else in New Jersey. Our CyberKnife® program is the largest and most experienced in the state. We also have a satellite emergency department in Union, NJ, which treats about 40,000 emergency cases each year.

Committed to providing exceptional care, Overlook Medical Center has achieved the prestigious Magnet® recognition. This designation from the American Nurses Credentialing Center is the highest national honor for nursing excellence. What’s more, Overlook Medical Center has advanced certification from The Joint Commission for perinatal care and is designated an Advanced Comprehensive Stroke Center. Additional Joint Commission-certified services include behavioral health care, spine surgery, wound care, and primary care medical home (PCMH).

EEO STATEMENT

Atlantic Health System, Inc. is an equal employment opportunity employer and federal contractor or subcontractor and therefore abides by applicable laws to protect applicants and employees from discrimination in hiring, promotion, discharge, pay, fringe benefits, job training, classification, referral, and other aspects of employment, on the basis of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, gender identity and sexual orientation), national origin, citizenship status, disability, age, genetics, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Director

It includes facilities such as Morristown Medical Center, Overlook Medical Center, Newton Medical Center, Chilton Medical Center, Hackettstown Medical Center, Goryeb Children's Hospital, CentraState Healthcare System, and Atlantic Home Care and Hospice. other.content: Atlantic Health System is one of the leading non-profit health care systems in the nation. It is headquartered in Morristown, New Jersey, and offers a wide range of healthcare services through its facilities and affiliated community-based healthcare providers.

Atlantic Health System has received awards and recognition for its services, including being named one of America's 50 Best Hospitals by Healthgrades, a World’s Best Hospital by Newsweek, and recognized as a Best Regional Hospital in the NY Metro area by U.S. News & World Report.

Atlantic Health System provides exceptional care through its Atlantic Neuroscience Institute, which is the region’s leader in neuroscience care. It also offers advanced neurological, neurosurgical, and neurodiagnostic services, and is certified as a Level IV Epilepsy Center and home to the Gerald J. Glasser Brain Tumor Center.
Overlook Medical Center has achieved Magnet® recognition, the highest national honor for nursing excellence, and is designated an Advanced Comprehensive Stroke Center by The Joint Commission.
Atlantic Health System is the official health care partner of the New York Jets and has more than 900 community-based healthcare providers affiliated through Atlantic Medical Group.
